mapper.select: select c_id, p_code, title, description, create_time, start_time, end_time, picture,status,#{userId} as userId from knowledge_planet.competition where p_code=#{planetCode} and status=1 order by start_time asc;

select c_id, p_code, title, description, create_time, start_time, end_time, picture,status,#{userId} as userId from knowledge_planet.competition where p_code=#{planetCode} and status=1 and start_time>now() order by start_time asc;
mapper.insert: insert knowledge_planet.competition(p_code, title, description, create_time, start_time, end_time, picture, status) values(#{planetCode},#{title},#{description},#{createTime},#{startTime},#{endTime},#{picture},#{status});
mapper.delete: delete from knowledge_planet.user_competition_rel where c_id=#{competitionId} and u_id=#{userId};
mapper.insert: insert knowledge_planet.user_question_rel(u_id, q_id, user_answer, get_score, is_right) values(#{userId},#{questionId},#{userAnswer},#{getScore},#{isRight});
insert knowledge_planet.question(c_id, content, answer, score, items) values (#{competitionId},#{content},#{answer},#{score},#{items});
